item.title: Describing Data
item.description: Length/Size Minimum and Maximum Values Unique Values Sum -- Length/Size -- R -- -- Rcpp -- -- C++ -- -- Python -- -- NumPy -- describing-data/r-length-size.R r_vector <- c(126, 793, 999, 525, 851, 798, 120, 714, 852, 151, 190, 41, 612, 826, 507, 105, 14, 237, 669, 7) r_vector #> [1] 126 793 999 525 851 798 120 714 852 151 190 41 612 826 507 105 14 237 669 7 length(r_vector) #> [1] 20 describing-data/rcpp-length-size.
